name: Apartment
description: Multi-unit residential buildings with individual flats or suites for urban living.

name: House
description: Independent residential homes suitable for families, offering privacy and space.

name: Commercial
description: Properties designed for business use, including offices, shops, and retail spaces.

name: Farmhouse
